title: How does the New York Review of Books decide which books to review? - Quora
tags: The New York Review of Books

response.answer_text: It's an interesting, but rather nosey question. Editors at NYRB are not likely to reveal their confidential methods of selection. Let's just say that, as in all business matters, the money factor looms large, tied in with useful connections, and so forth. It's an area good writers do well by staying away from it.
